feature.label: GEMOC Coordination
feature.description:
GEMOC Coordination components.
This feature regroups the GEMOC components used to enable the specification of language coordination patterns and to coordinate execution engines of possibly heterogeneous models.
This is done thanks to a coordination framework based on: BCoOL and an heterogeneous engine.
